resources.string: You\'ve done something awful. How are you supposed to use Shelves now?
No items in this collection to display!
You must first install the free ZXing Barcode Scanner application. You will be directed to the download page.
Error reading import file. Please try again.
Couldn\'t add %s. You might already have it.
Error with license check! Make sure you have an Internet connection, or try again later.

Some items were not added, since their barcode information wasn\'t available online. Try adding these missing items manually.\nThese results are stored in a file called %s, in the “shelves” folder on your SD card.
%s items couldn\'t be added (25 shown here):\n
This item must have a title before saving.
Since this item was created manually, there\'s nothing online to view!
You\'ve reached the maximum number of tags to add.
You have no items tagged, so you can\'t filter anything.
Enter a tag above,\nor choose a predefined one from below
Want to add this item to the multi-select queue? Just touch the cover, instead of long pressing it.
You have no items loaned out!
You must first add a contact before loaning an item
Loan unsuccessful: there was an unexpected error. Please try again.

You must manage this event through Shelves. For example, if you need to set a new due date for this item, open Shelves and change the loan due date. You can still choose to change the title and description here.\n\nIf you move or delete this calendar event, it won\'t be reflected in Shelves!
There\'s nothing here. You have everything you want!

Before using Shelves, you\'ll need to pick the region that best matches your location. Region affects everything, from item lookups to barcode scanning. This can be changed later in the app settings. In general, United States provides the best results.
Your region is %s. Items are found using this locale.
By Min Players, low to high
By Min Players, high to low
By Max Players, low to high
By Max Players, high to low
By Playing Time, low to high
By Playing Time, high to low
Define how many parameters you want to use to sort your items. Currently, this is %s.
The Google Calendar that manages loan notifications. Currently: %s
When on, information about items (tags, ratings, e.t.c.) are copied from the Import data
Import a list of items from files on the SD card
Import apparel found during the previous bulk scan, but never added.
Import a list of EANs defined in list_of_apparel.txt
Import board games defined in BGG_BoardGames.csv
Import board games defined in Shelves_to_Shelves_BoardGames.txt
Import books found during the previous bulk scan, but never added.
Import books defined in XML files
Import a list of ISBNs defined in list_of_books.txt
Import gadgets found during the previous bulk scan, but never added.
Import a list of EANs defined in list_of_gadgets.txt
Import movies found during the previous bulk scan, but never added.
Import a list of EANs defined in list_of_movies.txt
Import music found during the previous bulk scan, but never added.
Import a list of EANs defined in list_of_music.txt
Import software found during the previous bulk scan, but never added.
Import a list of EANs defined in list_of_software.txt
Import tools found during the previous bulk scan, but never added.
Import a list of EANs defined in list_of_tools.txt
Import toys found during the previous bulk scan, but never added.
Import a list of EANs defined in list_of_toys.txt
Import video games found during the previous bulk scan, but never added.
Import video games defined in Delicious_Library_VideoGames.txt
Import video games defined in MediaMan_VideoGames.csv
Import video games defined in Shelves_to_Shelves_VideoGames.txt
Import a list of EANs defined in list_of_videogames.txt
Export your collection to a file on the SD card
Export board games as Shelves_to_Shelves_BoardGames.txt (TSV file)
Export video games as Shelves_to_Shelves_VideoGames.txt (TSV file)
No Google Drive account found to upload collection to.
There was an error while sending your collection to Google Drive. Please try again later.
There was an error while bringing your collection from Google Drive. Please try again later.
Couldn\'t find spreadsheet on Google Drive!
Your collection, %s, is over 1 MB, and can\'t be sent to Google Drive. This is Google\'s rule, not mine.
Your collection has been sent to drive.google.com.
Your collection was brought from drive.google.com. It will now be imported.
Sends your collection to Google Drive as a spreadsheet. Files must be less than 1 MB.
Imports your collection from its Google Drive spreadsheet.
Enable Dropbox synching by signing into their website. Shelves stores none of your login information.
Stores your collection in Dropbox as Shelves import files.
Imports your collection from Dropbox as Shelves import files.
Choose collections to delete from Shelves
Deletes all your Shelves board games
Deletes all your Shelves video games
This will erase your entire collection, and can\'t be undone. Are you sure?
Buy from Google Play\n(then, restart your phone to remove ads)
Sorry! This feature is only available after you purchase the Shelves Unlocker from Google Play.
Google Play not found on this device!
Sorry! This feature is not supported for this item type. For more information, see the help.

Dear friend: I noticed that you haven\'t yet paid for this app. Is it working out for you? Do you enjoy it? Did you know that there\'s only a single person developing, testing, and marketing Shelves? It\'s true! Due to the popularity of the app, and the cost of maintaining a server to do the item lookups, I\'m going to have ask you, politely, to please consider buying the Shelves unlocker from the Google Play. Doing so will help me continue to work on Shelves uninterrupted.\nThis message is random, and will continue to appear at random intervals, unless the unlocker is purchased. I am sorry that it has come to this.
